item.title: Weird Tom Disch Connection
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Today at Readercon, my wife participated on a Necrology panel. (“Those we’ve lost this year…”) An audience member mentioned that Tom Disch wrote an episode of Miami Vice, featuring James Brown. Also appearing was Chris Rock, four years before New Jack City made him a movie star. Anyone who can tell me about the episode? […]
item.content:encoded:
Today at Readercon, my wife participated on a Necrology panel. (“Those we’ve lost this year…”)

An audience member mentioned that Tom Disch wrote an episode of Miami Vice, featuring James Brown.

Also appearing was Chris Rock, four years before New Jack City made him a movie star.

Anyone who can tell me about the episode? If not, consider this an open thread.
